response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and your interest, I propose an offer of $12,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity it presents for you. Should you decide to proceed, I assure you of a seamless transaction and exceptional service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
